fields.Title of Contribution (if applicable): Idaho Statesman, Lawyer for condemned Idaho inmate says he’s innocent  Read more here: http://www.idahostatesman.com/2012/05/26/2131542/lawyer-for-condemned-inmate-says.html#storylink=cpy
fields.Description/Abstract: Article describing the Leavitt case and mentioning the polygraph I conducted on Mr. Leavitt on Idaho's Death Row.
